title: Windows 10 anniversary update Freezing game
body: So i have been trying to play league this morning and when i turned on my computer i got the windows 10 anniversary update. i let it go and then tried playing league. all is going well, i pick my champion once in game que, and then it goes to start. Still going well, then a second into the game, my computer freezes and i cant do anything at all, like frozen to the point where i have to hard reset my computer. This was a ranked game and of course the team is going to remake the game so i lose LP for something that isn't my fault. I do the same thing again but i freeze on the loading screen. BOOM, 2 games automatic losses because i froze. goodbye 40 LP. I was wondering if anyone knows how to fix this???

replies.body: I know how to fix it, I wrote a discussion on it, its on my profile{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah, the anniversary update has had issues for some players and it may be due to a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disable that as your first step, which should get you fixed up.  Let me know!

Hi Porocles, i did this and it allowed me to somewhat still play but it seems this update has caused a host of other issues, namely I cant alt-tab out of game without it freezing and there probably are some others
Edit: so i game starts working right, so i test out a custom after the fix, it works, do an aram, its fine, then i load into ranked...and the bug starts again...i lose lp and get slapped with a 5 game 20 min q....there better be some compensation or at least an actual fix for this...
Is there going to be a way to get our LP back?? It's kind of unfair for the people who start ranked as soon as client opens and get dinged as leavers because of this. ðŸ˜ž
having the same issue....so are an insane amount of people....no one knows yet

Hey Tortellinis papa

I had the same problem. The quickest fix I have found is to: 

-right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" 

-This will run a diagnostic and open LoL in windows 7 mode. 

-Run a custom to make sure it's fixed. Close the App and save the setting.

The test will walk you through everything.


happy gaming!
